attributes.action: Stop the ongoing civil war in Srlianka
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ongoing civil war has killed many people. Each day hundreds of civilains die because of the conflict. There are an estimated 200,000 civilians trapped in the conflict. Just recently(07/04/09) the SLA used cheamical gas bomb to kill the LTTE even tough it was outlawed by the CWC. Please could you do somthing before its too late.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
